name: Zoo Protectors
description:
Co-op online Survival Game.

You are a panda. Covid-21 is in your zoo. Team up with your friends and save the helpless animals of the park.

General |

Players: 1-4
Multiplayer Online

Controls |
Movement: AWSD
Shooting: Mouse Button

Power Ups | Green Sphere = Heal

Enemies

Red Covid : Conditions | If it is close enough, explodes. Fast, Low HP
Green Covid: Does AOE Damage around itself.
